data.text:
published on 2024-08-08T17:18:14Z

Chuck Collins of climatecriminals.org is my guest on this "Digging in the Dirt". Chuck is here to talk about why he believes Itâs time to name the names of the individuals delaying climate action and financing the climate crisis, so they can be held accountable. Chuck Collins is an American author and a senior scholar at the Institute for Policy Studies in Washington, DC, where he directs the Program on Inequality and the Common Good. His latest book is a novel, âAltar to an Erupting Sun,â an eco-fiction exploration of the causes of climate disruption.
